entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one watching her and Harry. He is also quoted in the conversation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking from one to the other of Ron and her.

entities.name: her
entities.description: Her is mentioned as the one being watched by Ron and Harry.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned shouting from four floors below.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as possibly leaving a speck of dust on a poxy napkin ring.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as having a sister who is a bridesmaid.

entities.name: delacours
entities.description: The Delacours are mentioned as coming two days before the weddings.

relationships.description: Harry is looking at Ron and her.
Mrs. Weasley is shouting from four floors below.
Ron is blaming Ginny for leaving a speck of dust on a poxy napkin ring.
Harry is inviting the Delacours to come with him.
